Adding RPG aspects to Quest is EXTREMELY complicated and definitely not for beginners. I recommend using Pixie's CombatLib as it provides easy to follow tutorials and has a variety of features for you to utilize. Here is the link if you'd like to check it out. 

https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki

Hope this helps!

Anonynn.
